system.descriptionText: Once per Round as a Free Action, the wearer may inject a single dose of a loaded Drug into them. The Injector can carry a single dose of one type of Drug. Usually a Pain Suppressor that ignores a single Critical Effect that wouldn't kill the wearer.

description.value: Once per Round as a Free Action, the wearer may inject a single dose of a loaded Drug into them. The Injector can carry a single dose of one type of Drug. Usually a Pain Suppressor that ignores a single Critical Effect that wouldn't kill the wearer.
